## infiniteK Design System Compliance

<!-- Verify design system adherence -->

- [ ] **THE ANCHOR RULE:** No card on card, no tile on tile, no border on border
- [ ] **No emojis** used anywhere
- [ ] **No dashes** in user-facing copy
- [ ] **No rounded corners** on any UI elements
- [ ] **Complete words** (no unnecessary abbreviations)
- [ ] **Brand colors** (#3E2BB8, #5739FB) used appropriately
- [ ] **Proper spacing** from spacing scale
- [ ] **Typography hierarchy** maintained
